name: Crewsing Along
description:
• Added an animation to the "bird" in the main area
  • added background music and a score counter for Mr. crews. 
  • There is a play again screen to restart the level, and a game over scream as Terry falls to his buff demise. 
  • There will be more added before final submission
  • There was one bug regarding the final score count, but it was removed until it is fixed

Password: TerryCrews
